room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Escape Experience Chattanooga in Chattanooga
room_description: Your distant uncle, who you barely knew and always considered odd has passed away suddenly. Unexpectedly, you are named in his will and you are summoned to his home for the reading of it. Little do you know of the strange things your uncle has been up to and what he has in store for you. In a race against time, can you carry out your late uncle’s final wishes and escape with “it” before “they” come?
